title: WANTED: Cobb, Lajoie, Chase, Crawford Uzit
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Cobb, Lajoie, Chase, Crawford Uzit
posts.post_content:
Yeah. I know ... but it doesn't hurt to try.

I am interested in trading for any of these three very special combinations with the pieces listed below, which are attractive in my opinion. Cash can be included as is deemed necessary.

Please PM for scans of my trade material:

1.) Ty Cobb bat off ... American Beauty 460 (SGC 3)
2.) Ty Cobb red portrait ... Piedmont 42 (PSA 1)
3.) Ty Cobb green portrait ... Piedmont 150 (PSA 4)
4.) Uzit ... Hughie Jennings both hands (PSA 2)
5.) Red Hindu ... Zack Wheat (PSA 1.5)
6.) Brown Hindu ... Ed Walsh (SGC 3)


Thank you very much for your time ... and goodnight!

Derek

There is one on Ebay for 125 thousand.

Joe

[quote name="JoeKerr" post=1533891]There is one on Ebay for 125 thousand.

Joe[/QUOTE]

That one is just a tad out of my reach.

Thanks though :D

Derek
Derek, I regret not bidding higher on Jim's in REA last year.

[quote name="MVSNYC" post=1534264]Derek, I regret not bidding higher on Jim's in REA last year.[/QUOTE]

Jim Blumenthal's Cobb Uzit was simply amazing. One of the finest and most beautiful T206 rare back collections that I have ever seen was the Blumenthal collection. He knew everything there was to know.

Jim was such a great person, miss him.

Good luck with your search. I'll email you.
